product_name: Sierra Designs Frequency Fleece Jacket - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Wear the Sierra Designs Frequency Fleece Jacket for quick-drying insulation when you're hiking, cross-country skiing or snowshoeing on a cold winter day. Soft polyester microfleece feels great next to skin. Flatlock seams maximize motion and minimize abrasion. Full-zip reverse-coil zipper in front. 2 hand pockets. Closeout.
short_description: Wear the Sierra Designs Frequency Fleece Jacket for quick-drying insulation when you're hiking, cross-country skiing or snowshoeing on a cold winter day.
